Description: Waterproof Outdoor Sport Smart Bluetooth Wrist Watch Remote Control For Android or iOS-Apple System The Sports Digital Watch Can Be Whatever You Want, With Bluetooth 4.0 ,Both iPhone IOS and Android are Fully Compatible. Easily share it with your friends by Facebook, Twitter, etc and bring you a healthy life and enjoyment!The Battery Type CR2032 Can Be Replaced EasilyPackage ContentBluetooth Smart Watch 1pcsUser Guide 1pcs Payment Methods We only accept payment through Paypal.Please make payment within 5 days when you bid.We only ship to Paypal confirmed address.
